hero.name: IDIR
hero.headline: I Turn Chaos Into Workflows

about.label: About
about.personalIntro: I've helped hundreds of teams cut manual work by 70%+ using n8n, AI agents, and workflows that actually make sense.
about.intro: My job? Taking the 'it's complicated' out of automation. Whether you're a startup drowning in spreadsheets or an enterprise with 50 disconnected tools, I build systems that just work.
about.proofPodcast: Weekly podcast reaching devs in 12+ countries

modal.title: How we use your email
modal.intro: We take your privacy seriously. Here's exactly what happens with your email address:

section1.title: What we send
section1.content: You'll receive a daily email with AI news highlights and one welcome email when you sign up. That's it.

section2.title: What we don't do
section2.content: We will never sell, share, or use your email for anything else. No spam, no marketing emails, no third parties.

section3.title: Your control
section3.content: You can unsubscribe anytime with one click. No questions asked, no hoops to jump through.

modal.footer: Your email is stored securely and used exclusively for this newsletter.

benefits.daily: Daily email with top AI news and developments

feedbackEmail.introText: We detected you've been receiving the feed for a while. I need to calibrate the signal to optimize the content reaching your inbox.
feedbackEmail.question: What signal strength are you receiving?
feedbackEmail.strongSignalSubtext: I read almost everything, constantly learning new things
feedbackEmail.mediumSignalSubtext: I read some, find value from time to time
feedbackEmail.weakSignalSubtext: I barely read them, little value for me
feedbackEmail.footerSubtext: Ideas to optimize? Send your feedback here

courses.title: Courses
courses.subtitle: Learn automation, AI, and technology with practical courses designed to take you from concept to implementation.

meta.title: Automation 101 - Introduction Course | idir.ai
meta.description: Learn automation fundamentals without complicated tools. Practical course for beginners. 100% Free with optional support.

hero.title: Automation 101
hero.subtitle: Master Key Concepts to Save Hours and Multiply Your Productivity
hero.description: High-value training funded by your solidarity commitment. No technical jargon, no complicated tools. Just the concepts you need to start automating your work.
hero.valueStatement: No direct cost ‚Ä¢ Only requires your commitment

overview.label: WHY THIS COURSE?
overview.title: Automation Shouldn't Be Complicated
overview.intro: Most courses drown you in specific tools that become obsolete. Our approach is to teach you the fundamental thinking of automation so you master the logic and know what you need before choosing any specific tool.
overview.donationText: This course has a market value of ‚Ç¨100/$100, but I've decided to offer it at no direct cost to you. Instead, I ask for an honor commitment: a donation of ‚Ç¨5/$5 (or whatever amount you deem fair) to FreeCodeCamp, the nonprofit organization that has helped millions learn for free and drives projects in Latin America.
overview.transparencyText: For transparency and to avoid tax procedures, I do not accept or handle money. The link goes directly to FreeCodeCamp. Your donation goes 100% to the cause.

reason1.title: Concepts, Not Tools
reason1.description: You'll learn fundamental automation principles that apply to any tool or platform.

reason2.title: Real-World Practical Cases
reason2.description: Real-world examples you can apply immediately in your daily work.

reason3.title: For Beginners
reason3.description: No technical experience required. Explained in clear, simple language.

outcomes.label: WHAT YOU'LL LEARN
outcomes.title: Learning Outcomes
outcomes.description: By the end of this course, you'll be able to:

items.item1: Identify automation opportunities in your workflow
items.item2: Design effective automated processes without writing code
items.item3: Evaluate and select the right tools for your needs
items.item4: Implement simple automations that save you hours each week
items.item5: Understand when to automate and when NOT to automate
items.item6: Communicate automation ideas to technical and non-technical teams

regular.title: Open Access
regular.description: This course is freely accessible to everyone

senior.title: Donation Model
senior.description: I trust you to contribute what the course is worth to you. From ‚Ç¨0 to whatever your heart says. Your generosity enables more people to access quality education.

form.label: ENROLL NOW
form.title: Complete the Enrollment Form

commitment.title: üíé The Honor Commitment
commitment.checkboxLabel: I commit to making a direct donation to FreeCodeCamp before the first session (January 14, 2026), if my spot is confirmed, acknowledging the value of this course.
commitment.amountSuggestion: Suggested donation: ‚Ç¨5/$5 (or whatever amount you consider fair)
commitment.note: This commitment only applies if you receive spot confirmation. It is a personal promise that reflects your seriousness and appreciation of the content you will receive.

terms.label: I accept the
terms.confirmAccuracy: I confirm that the information provided is true and accurate.

form.submit: Confirm my commitment and access the course

confirmModal.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Final confirmation
confirmModal.intro: Before completing your enrollment, please confirm that you understand and accept:

point1.title: 1. Attendance commitment
point1.description: You commit to attending all 4 live sessions. If you cannot attend, you must notify in advance to free up your spot.

point2.title: 2. Direct donation to NGO
point2.description: The suggested donation of ‚Ç¨5/$5 goes directly to FreeCodeCamp (NGO), NOT to the instructor. Therefore, no refunds will be made. Only donate if you are committed.

success.title: Enrollment Successful!
success.message: Thank you for enrolling in Automation 101. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) for the confirmation email. The email will include information about whether your spot is confirmed or if you're on the waitlist. Remember: the donation commitment only applies if your spot is confirmed.
success.step1: Check your inbox for the confirmation email
success.step2: Follow the instructions to access the course content
success.step3: Start learning at your own pace!

form.error: Error processing enrollment. Please contact contact@idir.ai for assistance.
form.errorDuplicate: This email is already registered for this course. If you haven't received the confirmation email, please contact contact@idir.ai

item1.title: Week 1: Foundations
item1.description: Understand the Trigger, Action, Condition model. Identify repetitive tasks ready for automation.

item2.title: Week 2: First Automation
item2.description: Hands-on setup with a no-code tool (e.g., Zapier). Build and test a simple Trigger ‚Üí Action workflow (e.g., Google Form to Slack message).

item3.title: Week 3: Adding Logic
item3.description: Introduce Conditional Logic (Filters) to control when an automation runs. Learn basic data formatting and multi-step workflows.

item4.title: Week 4: AI in Automation Introduction
item4.description: Learn how AI can power up your automations. Practical introduction to tools that combine AI with automation and the basic concepts to continue learning.

logistics.label: COURSE FORMAT
logistics.summary: 4 live sessions ‚Ä¢ 1 hour weekly ‚Ä¢ Practical focus ‚Ä¢ From zero to your first functional automation
logistics.scheduleDetail: LATAM times: 13:00 Mexico City | 15:00 Bogot√°/Lima | 16:00 Santiago | 17:00 Buenos Aires
logistics.capacityReason: To ensure quality and personalized feedback
logistics.waitlistText: If demand exceeds 30, a waiting list will be created for future editions. The donation commitment only applies to participants with confirmed spots, not to those on the waitlist

modal.title: Final Confirmation
modal.message: Do you confirm that the data is correct and you accept the course commitment?

form.description: Fill in your details to get started.
